1.title: Deadlines, Wine and High Design
1.plot: Martyn is thrown into a panic when he hears of an issue that threatens to derail the installation of Tamara Mellon's $30 million Manhattan apartment. Kathryn brings her housekeeper, Jacqueline. to check on the progress of a stunning home in wine country, but they spend more time drinking wine than on design. Mary must navigate the personality quirks of a major client who defers design decisions to her beloved dog.

2.title: Partners in Pink
2.plot: Jeffrey may have made a mistake by giving Ross the lead on a major design project for supermodel and actress Amber Valletta. Kathryn runs into issues during the installation of a home in California wine country that could cost her the job. Mary and Martyn have a rocky start to the beginning of an important collaboration on a tabletop collection for One Kings Lane.

3.title: Frenemies
3.plot: Martyn and Mary journey to India to design a tabletop collection for One Kings Lane but major creative differences threaten to derail the collaboration. Kathryn travels to Dallas to help an old friend with her new home but finds herself in a power struggle that could sink the job and her friendship.

4.title: Creative Clash
4.plot: Ross jets off to New York for a modeling job, leaving Jeffrey in the lurch during the design of a multi-million dollar beach house in La Jolla, California. Martyn decides to redecorate his living room against the wishes of his partner Michael, and Mary clashes with fashion designer Monika Chiang over the design of her new Manhattan boutique.

5.title: Explosive Reveals
5.plot: Jeffrey's installation of a multi-million dollar beach house in La Jolla, California grinds to a halt when he discovers his custom designed rugs are nowhere to be found. Mary's best friend, Nathan Turner, moves in and helps her overcome her indecisiveness about how to redecorate her home. Martyn helps longtime friend and actress, Stacey Dash, redesign her home.

6.title: Mansion Madness
6.plot: Martyn, Mary, and Kathryn each design rooms in the historic Greystone Mansion in Beverly Hills as part of an exclusive Luxe Magazine show-house event. Competition ensues as they battle to see who can design the most beautiful space, but an all-out war erupts between Mary and Kathryn when they discover their rooms are adjacent to one another.

7.title: Designer to the Stars
7.plot: Kathryn is hired by Lindsay Lohan to reinvent her new home in the Hollywood Hills. Jeffrey faces a major challenge when his client demands he shop only from low-cost retail stores. Martyn returns to Chislehurst, England to help his sister Tina renovate an English Pub.

8.title: The Finishing Touch
8.plot: Kathryn completes Lindsay Lohan's new home in the Hollywood Hills but drama erupts in the middle of the installation as Lindsay is rushed to the hospital. Martyn dodges schedule delays to complete a spectacular renovation of his sister Tina's pub in his hometown, Chislehurst, England. Mary finishes redecorating her home and hosts a cocktail party for all of the designers where Jeffrey and Ross share some surprising news.

1.title: Darlings of Design
1.plot: Mary's plans for a Beverly Hills guesthouse are thrown into limbo when she learns that her client is getting a divorce and selling the house. In Hollywood, Martyn is thrown into a panic when he hears of a potential issue with Sharon and Ozzy Osbourne's new apartment. Meanwhile, Jeffrey is working on a new Malibu restaurant with his boyfriend/business partner Ross; and Kathryn invites all of the designers to her birthday party, and in her usual style shows up fashionably late.

2.title: Playgrounds for the Rich
2.plot: After years of working on a lavish $20 million estate in La Jolla, Jeffrey gets caught off-guard when his client shows up unannounced before the furniture is installed. Mary must convince her Beverly Hills client to trust her with the budget and vision for her guesthouse. In Laguna Beach, Nathan must liaise between his longtime client and her design-challenged contractor.

3.title: Life Is a Beach
3.plot: Martyn's dealt with his share of difficult clients, but when he travels to Mexico to meet Joe Francis he's told he must train the new staff on how to maintain the estate. In Pacific Palisades, Kathryn is hired to decorate the heir to the Max Factor fortune, Shannon Factor's home, and tries to make a strong enough impression to be kept on as the designer of Shannon's Malibu beach house as well.

4.title: Client Control
4.plot: Kathryn loses control of the fabric choices in Shannon Factor's Malibu beach house. Later, Martyn flies to New York to install special display boxes of Jimmy Choo shoes in a $30 million penthouse apartment. Meanwhile, Jeffrey surprises Ross with a swanky birthday party.

5.title: Designed for Disaster
5.plot: Kathryn must get Shannon Factor's Malibu house back on track after a bout of drama surrounding permits; and Martyn channels some "Cuban soul" into Daisy Fuentes' home. Meanwhile, Jeffrey takes offense when Ross insists his design scheme for the Malibu restaurant is incomplete, and the bickering continues outside the office. Later, the designers all come out to support Nathan's Indian-themed party, launching the sale of new items he recently purchased in India.

6.title: London Calling
6.plot: Martyn jets off to London to shop for an online site curated by famous interior decorators, but as it turns out, finding items at a reasonable price is harder than he expected. Kathryn also heads to London to help her ex-boyfriend furnish his country estate, but working with an ex proves nearly impossible for their two stubborn personalities. Meanwhile in Malibu, Jeffrey rips out the restaurant's floors without checking budget and faces a harsh reality when his client won't increase his funds.

7.title: The Suite Life
7.plot: Jeffrey and Ross attend the San Francisco Fall Antique Show and wind up shopping as much for themselves as they do for their clients. In Palm Springs, Martyn and Kathryn are at the Colony Palms Hotel, and as he scrambles to complete the hotel's presidential suite, she lounges by the pool basking in the sunshine. Meanwhile, close friends Mary and Nathan fly to North Carolina for the High Point Furniture Market.

8.title: Installment Insanity
8.plot: Sharon Osbourne presents Martyn with The Andrew Martin 2010 International Interior Designer of the Year Award, one of the top honors in the design world. Jeffrey and Ross run into a scheduling mishap that threatens to derail the completion of the Malibu restaurant they're designing. Meanwhile, Mary tackles the design of the grand entryway to the L.A. Antiques Show, one of the most prestigious design events in Los Angeles, and all the decorators come out to support her.

imdb.title: Million Dollar Decorators
plot: Expensive interior designers of Los Angeles star in a reality series.::Anonymous
